text: nimen dang wei an la zhi dao nuli fendou. Ta xuanze nimen [xiang renlei chuanbo yisilan jiao], zai [yisilan jiao de] zongjiao yiwu zhong, ta meiyou shi nimen kunnan [zhu], zhe [yisilan jiao] shi nimen de zuxian yi bu la xin de zongjiao. Yiqian he zai zhe bu “gulanjing” zhong, ta [an la] dou cheng nimen wei musilin, yibian shizhe [mu sheng] wei nimen zuozheng, er nimen wei renlei zuozheng. Nimen dang jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, jianxin an la. Ta shi nimen de baohu zhe. Baohu zhe zhen youyue! Yuanzhu zhe zhen youyue!
